level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary addition of the Act of Aug. 7, 1946, ch. 779, ยง 15a, concerning disposition of forfeitures, see ยง 2(i) of the Retirement of Public-School Teachers Omnibus Emergency Amendment Act of 2012 (D.C. Act 19-584, January 1, 2013, 60 DCR 134).
